name: Endless War (itch) (So Hai, cacapi236, gnycholas)
description:
Endless War
Face hordes of monsters in an attempt to keep alive and feed your inner berserk.

The idea behind the game was to create something similar to a beat-em-up, where the protagonist face hordes of monsters.
Each horde have a ammount of monsters and while the player beat one horde the game becomes gradually harder with more monsters in the stage.

Unfortunatelly we were not able to finish the game for the LibGDX Game Jam 24, but we learned a lot and we plan to finish the game.
